page.title: 17Letchmore Heath
page.content: Letchmore Heath is a small village situated on the outskirts of Watford. It is made up mainly of expensive detatched properties and cottages. These houses are basically found along the two roads which make up Letchmore Heath. The tranquil and beautifully kept. It has won many local competitions. There is a village green with a war memorial, a small pond,and the village is surrounded by fields. Once one leaves the village the roads revert to lanes. However this quiet little retreat is just five minutes away from the M1 motorway and just seventeen miles from London.Clearly then it is well placed for commuters.
